Asteroids Ahead.prompt: You are approaching an asteroid field...

options.text: Your the best. Navigate the asteroid field yourself. <mini game>
Trust your pilot to guide you through the field. <skip mini game>

Rations Low.prompt: You are running out of food. It seems you have to split your rations. How will you do so.

options.text: Try and divide them equally. <mini game>
I am the greatest and most important. I will eat all the rations myself.
Let the crew fight it out.

Rations Missing.prompt: You discover that some of the rations are missing.

options.text: Tell the group to deal with it.

Mouse Found.prompt: You discover a mouse has been eating your rations

options.text: Try and throw things at it. <mini game>
Have you engineer make a mouse trap. <skip mini game
